artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Published by Wakasaya Yoichi
inscription:
十八公栄霜後露　一千年色雪中深
jūhachi kō sakae shimo nochini tsuyu to naru,
issennes no iro secchū ni fukashi

English translation: When pine leaves turn into green, frost on them finally change into dew. One thousand-year lasting color had to be under snow deeply.(I guess!)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Macaw on Pine Branch
